ReportTitle.StrSql: SELECT NVL(C.USER_NAME, B.ANES_DOCTOR) ANES_DOCTOR, A.EVENT_ITEM_NAME, COUNT(*) SL FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_EVENT A, MED_OPERATION_MASTER B, MED_HIS_USERS C WHERE A.PATIENT_ID = B.PATIENT_ID AND A.VISIT_ID = B.VISIT_ID AND A.OPER_ID = B.OPER_ID AND A.EVENT_CLASS_CODE = '2' AND B.ANES_DOCTOR = C.USER_JOB_ID(+) AND B.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and B.anes_start_time<= :ENDTIME and (B.ANES_DOCTOR LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' OR C.user_job_id LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' OR C.user_name LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' or :VDOCNAME is null) GROUP BY NVL(C.USER_NAME, B.ANES_DOCTOR), A.EVENT_ITEM_NAME ORDER BY NVL(C.USER_NAME, B.ANES_DOCTOR), A.EVENT_ITEM_NAME

select a.patient_id,d.inp_no ,b.name,b.sex, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth,a.start_date_time ) age， nvl(c.dept_name,a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime,a.oper_scale,decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(e.USER_NAME，a.surgeon ) surgeon , a.anes_method,a.asa_grade, nvl(g.USER_NAME,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor , nvl(i.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE , nvl(j.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a ,med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c ,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users e,med_his_users g,med_his_users i,med_his_users j where a.patient_id=b.patient_id(+) and a.dept_code=c.dept_code and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and a.visit_id=d.visit_id and a.surgeon=e.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.anes_doctor =g.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE=i .USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE=j.USER_JOB_ID(+) and NVL(a.asa_grade,'其他')=:asagrade and a.start_date_time >=:STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) AND （g.USER_NAME =:VANES_DOCTOR or a.anes_doctor =:VANES_DOCTOR )

select a.patient_id,d.inp_no ,b.name,b.sex, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth,a.start_date_time ) age， nvl(c.dept_name,a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime,a.oper_scale,decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(e.USER_NAME，a.surgeon ) surgeon , a.anes_method,a.asa_grade, nvl(g.USER_NAME,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor , nvl(i.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE , nvl(j.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a ,med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c ,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users e,med_his_users g,med_his_users i,med_his_users j where a.patient_id=b.patient_id(+) and a.dept_code=c.dept_code and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and a.visit_id=d.visit_id and a.surgeon=e.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.anes_doctor =g.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE=i .USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE=j.USER_JOB_ID(+) and NVL(a.asa_grade,'其他')=:asagrade and a.EMERGENCY_IND=1 and a.start_date_time >=:STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) AND ( a.asa_grade =:ASACODE OR :ASACODE IS NULL )

select a.patient_id,d.inp_no ,b.name,b.sex, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth,a.start_date_time ) age， nvl(c.dept_name,a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime,a.oper_scale,decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(e.USER_NAME，a.surgeon ) surgeon , a.anes_method,a.asa_grade, nvl(g.USER_NAME,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor , nvl(i.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE , nvl(j.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a ,med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c ,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users e,med_his_users g,med_his_users i,med_his_users j where a.patient_id=b.patient_id(+) and a.dept_code=c.dept_code and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and a.visit_id=d.visit_id and a.surgeon=e.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.anes_doctor =g.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE=i .USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE=j.USER_JOB_ID(+) and NVL(a.asa_grade,'其他')=:asagrade and a.EMERGENCY_IND=0 and a.start_date_time >=:STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) AND ( a.asa_grade =:ASACODE OR :ASACODE IS NULL )

select a.patient_id,d.inp_no ,b.name,b.sex, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth,a.start_date_time ) age， nvl(c.dept_name,a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime,a.oper_scale,decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(e.USER_NAME，a.surgeon ) surgeon , a.anes_method,a.asa_grade, nvl(g.USER_NAME,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor , nvl(i.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE , nvl(j.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a ,med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c ,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users e,med_his_users g,med_his_users i,med_his_users j where a.patient_id=b.patient_id(+) and a.dept_code=c.dept_code and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and a.visit_id=d.visit_id and a.surgeon=e.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.anes_doctor =g.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE=i .USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE=j.USER_JOB_ID(+) and NVL(a.asa_grade,'其他')=:asagrade and a.EMERGENCY_IND is null and a.start_date_time >=:STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) AND ( a.asa_grade =:ASACODE OR :ASACODE IS NULL )

select a.patient_id,d.inp_no ,b.name,b.sex, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth,a.start_date_time ) age， nvl(c.dept_name,a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime,a.oper_scale,decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(e.USER_NAME，a.surgeon ) surgeon , a.anes_method,a.asa_grade, nvl(g.USER_NAME,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor , nvl(i.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE , nvl(j.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a ,med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c ,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users e,med_his_users g,med_his_users i,med_his_users j, MED_ANESTHESIA_INPUT_DATA k where a.patient_id=b.patient_id(+) and a.dept_code=c.dept_code and a.patient_id=d.patient_id and a.visit_id=d.visit_id and a.surgeon=e.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.anes_doctor =g.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE=i .USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE=j.USER_JOB_ID(+) and and a.patient_id=k.patient_id(+) and a.visit_id=k.visit_id(+) and a.oper_id=k.oper_id(+) and (k.death_after_oper=1 or k.anes_death=1) and NVL(a.asa_grade,'其他')=:asagrade and a.start_date_time >=:STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code=:deptcode or :deptcode is null) and ( a.asa_grade =:ASACODE OR :ASACODE IS NULL )

select a.patient_id,d.inp_no ,b.name,b.sex, fun_get_pat_age( b.date_of_birth,a.start_date_time ) age， nvl(c.dept_name,a.dept_code) deptname, a.operation_name ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate ,to_char(a.start_date_time,'hh24:mi') opertime,a.oper_scale,decode(a.emergency_ind,1,'急诊','择期') emergency_ind, nvl(e.USER_NAME，a.surgeon ) surgeon , a.anes_method,a.asa_grade, nvl(g.USER_NAME,a.anes_doctor) anes_doctor , nvl(i.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE) FIRST_OPER_NURSE , nvl(j.USER_NAME,a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE) FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE from med_operation_master a ,med_pat_master_index b, med_dept_dict c ,med_pat_visit d, med_his_users e,med_his_users g,med_his_users i,med_his_users j,MED_ANESTHESIA_EVENT K where a.patient_id=b.patient_id(+) and a.dept_code=c.dept_code and a.patient_id=d.patient_id(+) AND A.VISIT_ID=D.VISIT_ID and a.visit_id=d.visit_id and a.surgeon=e.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.anes_doctor =g.USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_OPER_NURSE=i .USER_JOB_ID(+) and a.FIRST_SUPPLY_NURSE=j.USER_JOB_ID(+) and A.PATIENT_ID=K.PATIENT_ID(+) AND A.VISIT_ID=K.VISIT_ID(+) AND A.OPER_ID=K.OPER_ID and (A.ANES_DOCTOR LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' OR G.user_job_id LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' OR G.user_name LIKE '%'||:VDOCNAME||'%' or :VDOCNAME is null) AND a.start_date_time >=:STARTTIME and a.start_date_time <= :ENDTIME and ((A.ANES_DOCTOR LIKE '%'||:VANESDOC||'%' OR G.user_job_id LIKE '%'||:VANESDOC||'%' OR G.user_name LIKE '%'||:VANESDOC||'%' or :VANESDOC is null)) AND EVENT_CLASS_CODE = '2' and ( K.EVENT_ITEM_NAME =:VYP )
